title: Improved Attendance
description: The Board of Education has established a goal for all students to attend school at least 94% of the time.

title: Appropriate Behavior
description: "Appropriate Behavior" refers to the actions or conduct of a student and its congruence with established school and classroom expectations.

title: Proficient Reading and Writing
description: Proficient performance in language arts is defined as grade level performance based on standards and benchmarks, report card grading guides, classroom assessments (e.g., PLAA subtests, running records, informal reading inventories,  6+1 Traits of Writing, or on standardized assessments like the WKCE.

title: Proficient Math
description: Proficient performance in mathematics is defined as grade level performance based on standards and benchmarks, report card grading guides, classroom assessments (e.g., PMA, fact interviews, problem-solving interviews), or on standardized assessments like the WKCE.
